entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-generation, json #61160
  • Perf improvement: https, json, mvc #61159
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json, tls-renegotiation-kestrel #61158
  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61155
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #61149
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, single_query #61148
  • The UserSecretsId in the project template should not contain application information #61147
  • Awaiting for some time in the ItemsProvider method in the Virtualize component and the user scrolling leads to unpredictable scrolling behaviour #61156

Closed

  • API proposal for CloseColumnOptionsAsync #61135
    10.0-preview4
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #61150
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #61142
  • Autumn 2024 repo health check #59098
    Discussions
  • [Blazor] `NavigationManager` API consolidation: `NotFound` method => `NotifyNotFound()` + `NotFoundEvent` => `NotFound` #61015
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Get rid of Blazor.boot.json and use a different strategy to flow the environment. #59456
    10.0-preview3
  • API proposal for NotFound #61133
  • Api proposal for NavLink.ShouldMatch #61137
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #61129

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Chrome download link and disable TerminalLogger for Helix tests #61157
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Blazor] Changes from API proposal for CloseColumnOptionsAsync #61154
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Remove explicit WasmBootConfigFileName from tests #61034
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • Api proposal fix for `NotFound` #61152
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • Api proposal fix for `NavLink.ShouldMatch` #61151
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • Remove unneeded 'fixed' statements from SocketAddress #61006
    area-networking, reduce-unsafe, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Make default stack size to be 1 MB in base16 #60811
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: extensions #8697
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #8659

PullRequests

  • Extensions: mark open issues as resolved #9258

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Update original and current values of tracked objects' unchanged properties (MergeOptions.PreserveChanges) #35844
  • Shadow properties ApplicationUserId and ApplicationRoleId created in UserRoles table when using ef migrations with IdentityModel #35842

Closed

  • Lazy loader performance issues #35832
    10.0.0
  • EF Core: Intercepting ADO.NET DbCommand that uses the same DbContext #35843
  • Implementing sharepoint as a db context #35837

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fixed Lazy loader performance issues #35835
    community-contribution
  • Make Cosmos tests faster #35841

Updated

  • Remove members obsoleted in EF 8 #35845

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS: Grid does not resize content when parent is hidden #28614
  • Update WindowsAppSDK to 1.7 #28613
  • RealParent of StackLayout has been Garbage Collected #28608
  • Dynamic Theme Changes Not Applying Properly with VisualStateManager #28606
    Backlog
  • EmptyViewTemplate Does Not Apply HeightRequest and WidthRequest, Causing Header and Footer to Be Invisible in CV2 #28605
  • Footer Not Displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView is Active in CV2 #28604
  • UnityView control #28602
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Windows] ListView cannot bind to ObservableCollection<System.Type> #16911
    Backlog
  • The fixed size grid row does not change size on the visibility change #14853
    Backlog
  • All first-level headings in the Table View Demo App page are centered on the iOS platform. #28154
    Backlog
  • All sub-titles on the Table View Demo App page are inconsistent on iOS, Android, and Windows platforms #28158
    Backlog
  • [Bug] iOS: CollectionView items don't change their size when item content size is changed #25650
    .NET 9 SR6
  • [CollectionView] Review Strategies to reduce Child Measure Propagation #25391
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • On iOS, ScrollView with MaximumWidthRequest does not limit the maximum width of its contents #21950
    Backlog
  • Trackpad horizontal scroll permanently locks scrolling axis in MAUI WebView #28131
  • SwipeItem inside custom Flyout does not fire command on iOS #20729
  • Reenable flaky UI test VerifyInitialEntryReturnTypeChange #27778
    .NET 9 SR7
  • MAUI MSAL authentication On Loginpage Back button is not visible. #28603
  • Inserting Item at index 0 in a collection view with ItemsUpdatingScrollMode="KeepScrollOffset", results in weird animation. #20806
    Backlog
  • Mac VS Code no hot reloead #28598

PullRequests

Created

  • Shell - Propagate BackButtonBehaviorProperty #28615
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28611
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [net10.0] Update net10.0 preview3 sdk/iOS/Android/runtime/aspnet #28609
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [iOS] Fixed Shell.SearchHandler ClearPlaceholderIcon Color Issue #28601
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #28612
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 5 #28583
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Align the Sender between the gestures when emit the events #28305
    area-gestures
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Update default value for LineHeight in the ToNSAttributedString method #28027
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-label, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Testing] Implemented InteractivePopGesture #28577
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix for border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows #28214
    community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] [ci] Don't use the short url for install script #28607
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28594
    area-navigation
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28560 #28584
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [Testing] - Fix for flaky UITests related to the virtual keyboard in Android and iOS platforms #27876
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Obsolete ListView and Cell types #28500
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • [Android] Picker - focus/unfocus events #28122
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Inherit AccessibilityTraits for views wrapped inside a WrapperView #27088
    platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-general, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28513
    area-testing
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, stale, t/desktop
  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using swipe gesture #27186
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/03/24] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28560
    p/0, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • Implements `SecureStorage.GetOrSetAsync(key, value?)` (for #27966) #28565
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 4) #27042
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-architecture, community ✨, t/perf

    area-navigation, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for FlyoutItem in overflow menu not fully interactable #27575
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed memory leak with PopToRootAsync when using TitleView #28547
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-titleview, t/perf, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android & iOS] - Fixed Entry and Editor from Accepting Input Values While Hidden. #27340

  • Add Binding.ConverterCulture #28595

  • [Android] Fixed incorrect tab content display in TabbedPage #27294
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# often reports false syntax errors after opening solutions #77810
  • Possible lock(System.Threading.Lock) perf improvement #77805
  • how can i use generated class as SyntaxProvider input? #77795
  • Consider making VisualStudioMetadataReferenceManager.ctor thread safe #77791

Closed

  • RoslynServiceExtensions should be removed in lieu of IAsyncServiceProvider3 #73636
    17.13
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35925.14 #77804
  • FailFast attempting to show light bulb in integration tests #35123
    Backlog
  • ENC attributes are generated in different orders for different runtimes #73513
    17.13
  • NormalizeWhitespace breaks multi-line comments #76856
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch to `features/extensions` #77826
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Workaround issue related to crossgen and specific .NET 9 runtimes #77825
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set PackageProjectUrl #77824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make GlobalOptionService initialization synchronous. #77823
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add build utils to simplify local package sharing #77822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure that newline is inserted after file scoped namespace declarations #77821
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: Review/adjust call sites of MethodSymbol.IsExtensionMethod API #77820
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77819
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Remove unused resx values #77818
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove unused resx values #77817
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extensions: check inferrability #77815
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Test, Please Ignore #77811
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clean up branches that we're excluding #77794
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Testing ideas #77793
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Remove feature option from DevNext #77816
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Reduce likelihood of needing a dual insertion in VS Code #77715
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Remove feature options entirely #77806
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation - Add remarks if available #77783
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unnecessary nullable directives #77814
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Stop using the rename dashboard"" #77774
    Needs UX Triage
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement name and signature conflict check across extension containers with the same receiver type #77747
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Simplify tests #77807
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not call JTF.Run from a bg thread in options initialization #77788
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection expression arguments: parse `with()` based on language version #77792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77803
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Address PROTOTYPE comment in ExtensionMethodBodyRewriter #77782
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Remove RoslynServiceExtensions.GetServiceAsync #77799
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow complex forms of IndexerName attributes in extensions #77781
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Update infra #77800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with disappearing newlines after multiline documentation comment #77521
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev17.15' #77802
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update maintenance-packages dependencies #77267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev17.15' #77798
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change SVsBrokeredServiceContainer retrieval to not use RoslynServiceExtensions #77775
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev17.15' #77796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set the default namespace for the project and proper folders for documents #77787
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not allow System.CommandLine to swallow all unhandled exceptions in LSP server #77786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev17.15' #77789
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Make `Implement with Copilot` light up on member name #77769
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Parse ignored directives #77696
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Generate Documentation - Add loading state #77718
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Null-conditional assignment: Add tests from test plan review #77717
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Razor EA: load from ServiceHubCore #77720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Another attempt to move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a bg thread #77768
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Ngen Priorities for VS #77748
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Implement support for Semantic Search agent and tool #77784
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support ILogger.BeginScope() for LSP logging #77647
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected behavior of the Console class in Windows Terminal #113895
  • System.IO.Ports.ReadByte() #113889
  • [wasm coreclr] document how to build coreclr on wasm #113885
    Future
  • System.Net.Requests test timeout #113883
  • Queryable.{Aggregate,Count}By accept optional argument values and cannot appear in an Expression tree #113881
  • Queryable.{Max,Min}By overloads accept an IComparer<TSource> instead of IComparer<TKey> #113878
    Future
  • [iOS] System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert causing app to crash #113874
  • APX: Assertion failed: `IsApxExtendedEvexInstruction(id->idIns())` #113870
    10.0.0
  • APX: Assertion failed 'size == info.compCompHnd->getClassSize(typeHnd)' #113869
    10.0.0
  • cannot import/export a component interface from dotnet.wasm to wasmtime #113868
    Future

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Implement Swift native handle as `SafeHandle` #3052
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet STS version is shown as the LTS version #47865
  • Telemetry Data Not Sent for dotnet new Command #47862
  • ExponentialRetry Method Does Not Retry on Exceptions #47861
  • Handling of Duplicate References in Solution Files #47860
  • Should Throw Error When Adding Projects with the Same Name but Different Paths to Solution Folder #47859

Closed

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-35390: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #34510
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33126: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #33214
    Discussion
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33128: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #33211
    Discussion
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33135: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #33210
    Discussion
  • .net9 Seems to ignore Directory.Build.props (or Directory.Build.targets or D.Packages.props) #46840
  • Regression in dotnet publish using .NET 9 SDK 9.0.200 #47227

PullRequests

Created

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not show VS workloads from an old version Fixes #47794 #47809

    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • dotnet CLI: Rename project and command sub-folders #47800
    Area-CLI
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359

  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
